Module view.bookscrabble
Package model.logic.server

Class HostServer

java.lang.Object
model.logic.server.MyServer
model.logic.server.HostServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class HostServer extends MyServer implements Serializable
The HostServer class represents a server that hosts a game session. It extends the MyServer class and provides additional functionality for managing the game and interacting with clients.
See Also:

      public HostServer(int port, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      Constructs a new HostServer with the specified port and client handler.
      Parameters:
      port - The port number to listen on.
      clientHandler - The client handler to use for handling client connections.

      public void close()
      Description copied from class: MyServer
      Closes the server and stops accepting new connections. Also, closes the client handler.
      Overrides:
      close in class MyServer

    • isGameRunning

      public boolean isGameRunning()
      Checks if the game is currently running.
      Returns:
